version_description:
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

If you enjoy using this app, please consider rating it after each update. The feedback we get from you helps us to keep improving the product.

Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

If you enjoy using this app, please consider rating it after each update. The feedback we get from you helps us to keep improving the product.

AccuWeather and ABC are expanding our partnership by incorporating content from ABC directly into the app. Depending on your location, content from your local ABC forecaster may show up in a variety of areas which will help inform you on weather that coul

AccuWeather and ABC are expanding our partnership by incorporating content from ABC directly into the app. Depending on your location, content from your local ABC forecaster may show up in a variety of areas which will help inform you on weather that coul
Some users were experiencing a delay launching version 10.3 of the app. We apologize for the inconvenience and have addressed this issue with 10.3.1. The app should now perform optimally.
Some users were experiencing a delay launching version 10.3 of the app. We apologize for the inconvenience and have addressed this issue with 10.3.1. The app should now perform optimally.

With the release of 10.3 some users have experienced crashes or empty data. We apologize for the inconvenience. With the 10.3.2 update, these issues should be resolved.

Also, for users who have expressed concern over changes to the Daily Forecast a

With the release of 10.3 some users have experienced crashes or empty data. We apologize for the inconvenience. With the 10.3.2 update, these issues should be resolved.

Also, for users who have expressed concern over changes to the Daily Forecast a

Access these new mapping layers from the home screen by tapping 'Radar' -&
